directions.step:
Makes two 12" pizza crusts. 8 Servings each.
1. In a large bowl, combine 2 cups flour, the yeast and salt. With electric mixer, slowly beat in water; beat 2 minutes, occasionally scraping bowl with rubber spatula. With mixer on medium speed, beat in 1/2 cup flour; beat 2 minutes, until dough is stiff. Stir in 1 1/2 cups flour. 2. Sprinkle clean work surface with 1/4 cup flour.
